version_description:
Improve user experience.
Bug Fixed.

New Content!
Challenge Mode -> "Tap The Gold, Get The Money!"
Bug Fixed!

• Now, iPad support!
• Improve UX / UI.
• Add 3 New Machine (Sharp Blade Machine, Spring Punch, Zero Gravity)
• Modifying the Challenge Mode Balance.
• Bug fixed.

Change the Character Art .
Improved user experience.
Bug Fixed.

Bug fixed!
Have Fun!

Bug fixed.
Have fun.

• The value of the product has been improved. (You can earn money faster than before.)
• We are now able to manage factories in various languages. (8 languages)
• Do you want to start easily? Check out the shop for Starter Package!
• Do you want to get Diamonds every day? Check out the shop for Premium Delivery!
• The factory was repaired. (Bug Fixes)

Do you have a good idea? Please contact us by email at hi@playhardlab.com
bug fixed
Bug Fixed.
Bug Fixed.
We update the game regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available game features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
bug fixed.
